Name: Weather Ball
Effect: Single Target. Projectile Move. If there is a weather condition on the field, add 2 Extra Dice to the Damage Pool. This Move's type will change according to the Weather: Sun/Fire, Rain/Water, Hail/Ice, Sand/Rock, Wind/Flying.
Description: A ball created out of the forces of the weather. Todayâ€™s forecast is cloudy with a chance of pain!
